column4: hello i just installed ubuntu but i wanted to ask about the internet connection as i cannot connect to the internet... if there is someone that can help me .....
hello i just installed ubuntu but i wanted to ask about the internet connection as i cannot connect to the internet... if there is someone that can help me .....
do you have an external modem?
do you have the nameservers and numbers for your isp?
well, sudo pppconfig should walk you througha configuration; it isn't too hard
in a terminal, sudo pppconfig   -and see how you go
if you do, read man pppconfig as well
no worries -come back if you have problems :)
no need for apologies - we are all learning :)
and you will learn much more, I'm sure
do you want me to explain, or would you rather tell bob2 yourself?
